Room.Name: Cyclops Cavern
Room.ShortDescription: You have fallen into the den of the dreaded Cyclops.
Room.LongDescription: The cyclops is a deadly giant with only one eye. He feeds on human flesh. He has burrowed under the crypt and broke through some of the paths to lure unsuspecting victims. The room you are in is huge and there's priceless treasures all around.
